#labels libupnpx.a
== Build libupnpx.a  ==

Before using the library you have to build the desired version. 

 * use XCode 4.n and open the project: *./upnpx/projects/ios/upnpx/upnpx.xcodeproj*

during this tutorial we will create a simple project for the iPhone Simulator, so you need to change the build scheme to "upnpx | iPhone n.n Simulator".
 

 * Build the project:

The result is the upnpx static library: *libupnpx.a*


 * If you built the iPhone Simulator Debug build, the library will be found at: *./upnpx/projects/ios/upnpx/build/Debug-iphonesimulator/libupnpx.a*
